name: travel_delays
rows: Crash on I-84 eastbound .2 miles east of Exit 17: PA 191 - HAMLIN/NEWFOUNDLAND. There is a lane restriction.
Multi vehicle crash on I-79 southbound .6 miles south of Exit 54: PA 50 - BRIDGEVILLE. There is a lane restriction.
Debris on roadway on US 6 eastbound 0 miles EAST of Exit 4: SALEM ROAD/ARCHBALD/CORTEZ. All lanes now open.
Utility work on MCKNIGHT RD / EVERGREEN RD northbound between HOUSTON RD and SIEBERT RD. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on LINGLE AV both directions between (LANCASTER County Line)+ NORTHSIDE DR and OATFIELD LN. All lanes closed.

Multi vehicle crash on DANNENHOWER BR / MARKLEY ST / BRIDGEPORT BP northbound between and LC TO MAIN ST. There is a lane restriction.

Incident on I-76 West. The right shoulder is blocked, expect delays.
